version_description:
1.0.7
-New added theme song "Colorful Voice"
-Performance debugging and optimization

VOEZ 1.0.8
-Fixed issues of certain music and note types delayed during gameplay
-Fixed misc issues

VOEZ has just updated to 1.1 version today, new content as below:
- "Song Packs" added
Newly added "song packs" available for purchase, songs contained will not be released as singles
- Song select interface update
The song select interface ha

VOEZ 1.1.1
- Fixed issue of achievements tab not properly displaying while player selects difficulty

VOEZ 1.1.2 version released
Older versions of the game are no longer functioning, please update to the latest version before playing

-Optimized performance of song selection menu
-Fixed other minor issues

VOEZ Update
Fixed the issue which would not allow players to login via Facebook
- Fix issue in which the opening animation cannot be skipped when starting the game in iOS 11.

VOEZ Update
Fixed the issue which would not allow players to login via Facebook

VOEZ 1.1.5
-Added supports for different screen resolutions
-Updated login system, also supports Sign in with Apple
-Optimized multiple programs to increase players' gaming experience
